thread.section_title: Toptal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Toptal | toptal.com
thread.title: Gilman

author: Gilman
title: Gilman
text:
We have been using Toptal at Pit Rho for several months and have engaged with them on two separate projects so far.
Although they offer part- and full-time placements, we've currently used them for short-term project work (specifically, design projects).
The process has been seamless, the candidates they find are extremely well suited to the task(s) at-hand, and we've had a great experience. Another aspect of their service that I'd like to highlight is that it saves us a tremendous amount of time, as they have already filtered the top candidates for us.
I highly recommend Toptal and will continue to be a happy customer of theirs!
